languages.text: "Впервые мы в чем-то согласны, ведьма. Я тоже в это не верю".
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Idira's first quest and the RT let her live and remain on the roster.
Idira:"I still can't believe that you let me stay, Lord Captain... You didn't get rid of me... I'll prove— I'll live up to the trust you've placed in me."

traits.locale_text: "Впервые мы в чем-то согласны, ведьма. Я тоже в это не верю".

languages.text: "For the first time, we can agree on something, witch. I can't believe it either."
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Idira's first quest and the RT let her live and remain on the roster.
Idira:"I still can't believe that you let me stay, Lord Captain... You didn't get rid of me... I'll prove— I'll live up to the trust you've placed in me."
languages.original_text: "Впервые мы в чем-то согласны, ведьма. Я тоже в это не верю".

traits.locale_text: "For the first time, we can agree on something, witch. I can't believe it either."
"For the first time, we can agree on something, witch. I can't believe it either."
"For the first time, we can agree on something, witch. I can't believe it either."
"For the first time, we can agree on something, witch. I can't believe it either."
"For the first time, we can agree on something, witch. I can't believe it either."
"For the first time, we can agree on something, witch. I can't believe it either."

languages.text: 「初めて意見が一致したな、魔女。こんな日が来るとは俺も思わなかった」
languages.original_text: "For the first time, we can agree on something, witch. I can't believe it either."

traits.locale_text: 「初めて意見が一致したな、魔女。こんな日が来るとは俺も思わなかった」

languages.text: "Wir sind uns zum ersten Mal bei etwas einig, Hexe. Ich fasse es auch nicht."
languages.original_text: "For the first time, we can agree on something, witch. I can't believe it either."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind uns zum ersten Mal bei etwas einig, Hexe. Ich fasse es auch nicht."

languages.text: « Pour la première fois, nous sommes du même avis, sorcière. Je n'arrive pas à le croire non plus. »
languages.original_text: "For the first time, we can agree on something, witch. I can't believe it either."

traits.locale_text: « Pour la première fois, nous sommes du même avis, sorcière. Je n'arrive pas à le croire non plus. »

languages.text: «Por primera vez estamos de acuerdo en algo, bruja. No, yo tampoco doy crédito».
languages.original_text: "For the first time, we can agree on something, witch. I can't believe it either."

traits.locale_text: «Por primera vez estamos de acuerdo en algo, bruja. No, yo tampoco doy crédito».

languages.text: “这还是我们第一次达成共识，女巫。我也不敢相信。”
languages.original_text: "For the first time, we can agree on something, witch. I can't believe it either."

traits.locale_text: “这还是我们第一次达成共识，女巫。我也不敢相信。”

languages.text: "İlk kez aynı fikirdeyiz cadı. Ben de inanamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "For the first time, we can agree on something, witch. I can't believe it either."

traits.locale_text: "İlk kez aynı fikirdeyiz cadı. Ben de inanamıyorum."

languages.original_text: "For the first time, we can agree on something, witch. I can't believe it either."
